benchmark_details.name: ChatBench
benchmark_details.overview: ChatBench is a new dataset comprising AI-alone, user-alone, and user-AI data for 396 questions, including 144K answers and 7,336 user-AI conversations, converted from the MMLU benchmark to facilitate human-AI evaluation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate how humans interact with LLMs and how these interactions change evaluation conclusions compared to traditional AI-alone benchmarks.

data.source: ChatBench is compiled from a user study involving human interactions with AI and data from MMLU.
data.annotation: Manually verified user interactions and AI responses.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is computed as the fraction of correct answers over total answers.
methodology.interpretation: A higher accuracy indicates better model performance in user-AI interactions compared to individual performances.
methodology.validation: User data was validated through attention checks and filtering criteria for quality assurance.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Data includes various user demographics for a representative sampling.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data was anonymized to protect participant privacy, with personal information checked and removed.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Informed consent was obtained from all participants.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: The study complies with GDPR regulations regarding participant data.
